fields.name: Q: What is Kishimoto Token?
fields.value: A: Anime based Token available to trade on 4 chains including ETH([link](https://etherscan.io/token/0xf5b1fd29d23e98db2d9ebb8435e1082e3b38fb65 "https://etherscan.io/token/0xf5b1fd29d23e98db2d9ebb8435e1082e3b38fb65")), BSC([link](https://bscscan.com/token/0xcab599d699f818e6cefd07cf54f448dab9367b05 "https://bscscan.com/token/0xcab599d699f818e6cefd07cf54f448dab9367b05")), FTM([link](https://ftmscan.com/token/0x8b6663725d7e7368b01eefddc16be085e492498e "https://ftmscan.com/token/0x8b6663725d7e7368b01eefddc16be085e492498e")) and AVAX([link](https://snowtrace.io/token/0x8b6663725d7e7368b01eefddc16be085e492498e "https://snowtrace.io/token/0x8b6663725d7e7368b01eefddc16be085e492498e")). The **Whitepaper** explains the value of the project which can be found [here](https://kishimototoken.com/KishimotoInuwhitepaper.pdf "https://kishimototoken.com/KishimotoInuwhitepaper.pdf").

fields.name: Q: What is Katsumi Token?
fields.value: A: Katsumi is a special Kishimoto Utility token that will help burn Kishimoto tokens, Give to charities and reward holders with voting power for specific causes and initiatives. Katsumi token is available on ETH([link](https://etherscan.io/token/0x5e4efb364071c64ee3641fe1e68cb5d2d5558709))

fields.name: Q: When did Kishimoto Inu launch?
Q: Is the Smart Contract audited?
Q: I have a proposal who can I contact?
Q: What is the address of the contract?
fields.value:
A: We are on the ETH and BSC chain:
- ETH: 0xf5b1fd29d23e98db2d9ebb8435e1082e3b38fb65
- BSC: 0xCAb599D699f818e6ceFd07cF54f448DAB9367B05

fields.name: Q: Why are the token prices different on centralized exchanges?
fields.value: A: Centralized exchanges (*CEXs*) have there own order book that must be reconciled between the buys and sells for that particular asset and for each pairing

fields.name: Q: When purchasing Kishimoto Inu tokens on a DEX, what should my slippage tolerance be set to?
fields.value: A: Slippage should be 12-15% for further questions go to <#900975814336712714> community member will help :ninja:

fields.name: Q: Where can I buy Kishimoto Inu?
fields.value:
A: On our own DEX [KishiSwap](https://kishiswap.com/swap?outputCurrency=0xf5b1Fd29d23e98Db2D9EBb8435E1082e3B38FB65 "Kishiswap") or on any  DEXs and CEXs which are listed below.

*Decentralized Exchanges (DEXs)*:
- [Uniswap](https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?exactField=input&exactAmount=10&outputCurrency=0xf5b1fd29d23e98db2d9ebb8435e1082e3b38fb65 "Uniswap")
- [Pancakeswap](https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0xcab599d699f818e6cefd07cf54f448dab9367b05 "Pancakeswap")
- [ShibaSwap](https://shibaswap.com/#/swap?outputCurrency=0xf5b1Fd29d23e98Db2D9EBb8435E1082e3B38FB65 "Shibaswap")
- [FEGex](https://fegex.com/ "FEGex")

*Centralized Exchanges:*
-	[Hotbit](https://www.hotbit.io/exchange?symbol=KISHIMOTO_nUSD)
-	[Lbank](https://www.lbank.info/exchange/kishimoto/usdt)
-	[BKEX](https://www.bkex.com/trade/KISHIMOTO_USDT)
-	[ZT](https://www.ztb.im/exchange?coin=KISHIMOTO_USDT)
-	[XT](https://www.xt.com/tradePro/kishimoto_usdt)

fields.name: Q: Won't Kishimoto Inu face copyright issues?
fields.value: A: Kishimoto Inu doesn't utilize any artwork that has not been produced by a graphic designer we employed. The current logo for example was hand drawn by one of our community members ([Telegram Announcement](https://t.me/Kishimoto_Inu/275504?single) and [Instagram-artbypaulallstar](https://www.instagram.com/artbypaulallstar/)) and is not a copy of any characters.

fields.name: Q: Charity?
fields.value:
A: Yes. 
- 15 ETH was donated to the [Manny Pacquiao Foundation](https://twitter.com/MPac_Foundation/status/1455279933714939904 "https://twitter.com/MPac_Foundation/status/1455279933714939904")
